subtopics.name: C4 Model
subtopics.content: A popular modeling tool for system design. It is a visual modeling language that helps you to capture the different components of a system and their relationships.

subtopics.name: Draw io
subtopics.content: A free online diagramming tool that can be used to create system diagrams.

subtopics.name: Lucidchart
subtopics.content: A paid diagramming tool that offers more features than Draw.io.

subtopics.name: Designing Data-Intensive Applications
subtopics.content: This book by Martin Kleppmann covers the design of large-scale data-intensive applications.

subtopics.name: The Pragmatic Programmer
subtopics.content: This classic book by Andrew Hunt and David Thomas covers many topics related to software development, including system design.

subtopics.name: System Design Interview Handbook
subtopics.content: This book by John Sonmez covers the system design interview process. It includes a lot of practice problems and solutions.

subtopics.name: System Design Primer
subtopics.content: This website by Martin Kleppmann provides a comprehensive overview of system design.

subtopics.name: Grokking the System Design Interview
subtopics.content: This website by Educative.io provides a course on system design. It includes a lot of video lectures and practice problems.

subtopics.name: Leetcode
subtopics.content: This website provides a large number of practice problems for system design.
